item.majruszsaccessories.giant_seed.item: Gives a chance to double the loot from the crops.
item.majruszsaccessories.lucky_rock.item: Gives a chance for extra loot when mining.
item.majruszsaccessories.idol_of_fertili: Gives a chance of having twins after breeding two animals.
item.majruszsaccessories.taming_certific: All the animals you tame will be empowered.
Right click on the animal for more information about attributes.
item.majruszsaccessories.secret_ingredie: Makes all potions stronger and last longer.
Right click on the brewing stand to enhance all potions.
The amplifier and duration of all potions have been improved.
item.majruszsaccessories.magma_stone.ite: Makes you always set mobs on fire and automatically smelt blocks.
majruszsaccessories.items.accessory_item: Works when held in the other hand.
majruszsaccessories.bonuses.extra_stone_: Gives %1$s chance for extra loot when mining.
majruszsaccessories.bonuses.spawn_twins: Gives %1$s chance of twins when breeding animals.
majruszsaccessories.bonuses.potion_ampli: Gives additional %1$s level(s) of created potions.
majruszsaccessories.bonuses.potion_durat: Decreases duration of created potions by %1$s.
advancements.majruszsaccessories.idol_of: Week of Animals - Double Growth for Animals
